title: Opioid Claims
text: This is an EDA Project I worked on with two other people in June 2025. We were focused on opioid prescription claims and wanted to understand how the specific opiates prescribed varied by provider specialty in addition to how this varied across states.

title: Healthcare Access and Preventable Hospital Stays
text: This is a project I worked on with two other people in July 2025 as a Capstone for our undergraduate research internship with Carnegie Mellon University and United Health Group. Our research focused on analyzing how healthcare access impacted preventable hospitalizations of different racial groups at the county level.

title: Payson Johanson
text:
Hello! My name is Payson, and I am a senior at Clark University studying Mathematics and Philosophy. My academic journey began with a deep interest in logic and philosophical reasoning, which honed my ability to think critically and approach problems from multiple perspectives. Over time my interests evolved toward the quantitative and analytical, leading me to pursue mathematics as my primary focus.
Alongside my core studies, I am expanding into the life sciences, with upcoming coursework in Genetics and Neuroscience. This interdisciplinary foundation fuels my interest in applying mathematical and computational methods to complex problems in biology and healthcare.
Outside of academics, I enjoy running, reading, and spending time outdoors.
